Title: Provides a $500,000 supplemental valuation impact grant to the West Valley central school district during the 2024-2025 school year
Summary: Provides a $500,000 supplemental valuation impact grant to the West Valley central school district during the 2024--2025 school year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing a supplemental valuation impact grant to the West Valley central school district
